name: 3..2..1..Grenades!
description: 3..2..1..Grenades! is a snowball fight with high explosives. Help save Grenades Co from the terrible monster it's unleashed in this LOCAL MULTIPLAYER ADVENTURE GAME. Save the day or battle it out by yourself with bots, or with up to 4 of your friends!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: 2Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 600 MB available space
